Package com.solanamobile.seedvault

Class Wallet

java.lang.Object
com.solanamobile.seedvault.Wallet
@RequiresApi(api=30) public final class Wallet extends Object
Programming interfaces for WalletContractV1

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    Wallet.ActionFailedException
    Thrown by methods to indicate a failure of a Seed Vault Wallet action
    static final class 
    Wallet.NotModifiedException
    Thrown by methods that modify the state of the Seed Vault Wallet if the target of the modification (such as an account) does not exist.

  • Method Details

    • authorizeSeed

      @NonNull public static Intent authorizeSeed(int purpose)
      Request authorization of a new seed for the specified purpose. The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onAuthorizeSeedResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      purpose - the purpose for which the seed will be used. One of the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* constants.
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • onAuthorizeSeedResult

      public static long onAuthorizeSeedResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of authorizeSeed(int))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      the auth token for the newly authorized seed
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if the authorization failed

    • createSeed

      @NonNull public static Intent createSeed(int purpose)
      Request creation of a new seed for the specified purpose. The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onCreateSeedResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      purpose - the purpose for which the seed will be used. One of the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* constants.
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • onCreateSeedResult

      public static long onCreateSeedResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of createSeed(int))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      the auth token for the newly created seed
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if the creation failed

    • importSeed

      @NonNull public static Intent importSeed(int purpose)
      Request import of an existing seed for the specified purpose. The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onImportSeedResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      purpose - the purpose for which the seed will be used. One of the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* constants.
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • onImportSeedResult

      public static long onImportSeedResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of importSeed(int))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      the auth token for the imported seed
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if the import failed

    • signTransaction

      @NonNull public static Intent signTransaction(long authToken, @NonNull Uri derivationPath, @NonNull byte[] transaction)
      Request that the provided transaction be signed (with whatever method is appropriate for the purpose originally specified for this auth token). The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onSignTransactionsResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to perform transaction signing
      derivationPath - a BipDerivationPath representing the account with which to sign this transaction
      transaction - a byte[] containing the transaction to be signed
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • signTransactions

      @NonNull public static Intent signTransactions(long authToken, @NonNull ArrayList<SigningRequest> signingRequests)
      Request that the provided transactions be signed (with whatever method is appropriate for the purpose originally specified for this auth token). The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onSignTransactionsResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to perform transaction signing
      signingRequests - the set of transactions to be signed
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if signingRequests is empty

    • onSignTransactionsResult

      @NonNull public static ArrayList<SigningResponse> onSignTransactionsResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of signTransaction(long, Uri, byte[]) or signTransactions(long, ArrayList))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      a List of SigningResponses with the transaction signatures
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if transaction signing failed

    • signMessage

      @NonNull public static Intent signMessage(long authToken, @NonNull Uri derivationPath, @NonNull byte[] message)
      Request that the provided message be signed (with whatever method is appropriate for the purpose originally specified for this auth token). The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onSignMessagesResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to perform message signing
      derivationPath - a BipDerivationPath representing the account with which to sign this message
      message - a byte[] containing the message to be signed
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • signMessages

      @NonNull public static Intent signMessages(long authToken, @NonNull ArrayList<SigningRequest> signingRequests)
      Request that the provided messages be signed (with whatever method is appropriate for the purpose originally specified for this auth token). The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onSignMessagesResult(int, Intent).
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to perform message signing
      signingRequests - the set of messages to be signed
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if signingRequests is empty

    • onSignMessagesResult

      @NonNull public static ArrayList<SigningResponse> onSignMessagesResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of signMessage(long, Uri, byte[]) or signMessages(long, ArrayList))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      a List of SigningResponses with the message signatures
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if message signing failed

    • requestPublicKey

      @NonNull public static Intent requestPublicKey(long authToken, @NonNull Uri derivationPath)
      Request the public key for a given BipDerivationPath of a seed. The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onRequestPublicKeysResult(int, Intent). If the public key is not present in the results of getAccounts(Context, long, String[]), the user will be asked to authorize access to this public key.
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to request a public key
      derivationPath - a BipDerivationPath representing the account from which to request the public key
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)

    • requestPublicKeys

      @NonNull public static Intent requestPublicKeys(long authToken, @NonNull ArrayList<Uri> derivationPaths)
      Request the public keys for a set of BipDerivationPaths of a seed. The returned Intent should be used with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), and the result (as returned to Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)) should be used as parameters to onRequestPublicKeysResult(int, Intent). If the public keys are not present in the results of getAccounts(Context, long, String[]), the user will be asked to authorize access to these public keys.
      Parameters:
      authToken - the auth token for the seed with which to request a public key
      derivationPaths - an ArrayList of BipDerivationPaths representing the accounts from which to request the public keys
      Returns:
      an Intent suitable for usage with Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if derivationPaths is empty

    • onRequestPublicKeysResult

      @NonNull public static ArrayList<PublicKeyResponse> onRequestPublicKeysResult(int resultCode, @Nullable Intent result) throws Wallet.ActionFailedException
      Process the results of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) (in response to an invocation of requestPublicKeys(long, ArrayList))
      Parameters:
      resultCode - resultCode from onActivityResult
      result - intent from onActivityResult
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of PublicKeyResponses with the public keys
      Throws:
      Wallet.ActionFailedException - if the public keys request failed

    • getAuthorizedSeeds

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAuthorizedSeeds(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing the authorized seeds for the current app. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.AUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor

    • getAuthorizedSeeds

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAuthorizedSeeds(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection, @Nullable String filterOnColumn, @Nullable Object value)
      Request a Cursor containing the authorized seeds for the current app which match the provided query. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.AUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      filterOnColumn - the column from WalletContractV1.AUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS on which to filter
      value - the value of filterOnColumn which all returned rows must match
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if filterOnColumn is not a column in WalletContractV1.AUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS, or if value cannot be interpreted as an appropriate type to match against filterOnColumn values.

    • getAuthorizedSeed

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAuthorizedSeed(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing the specified authorized seed for the current app. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.AUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS. If the specified auth token is not found, the returned Cursor will be empty.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token of the authorized seed to return in the Cursor
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor

    • deauthorizeSeed

      public static void deauthorizeSeed(@NonNull Context context, long authToken) throws Wallet.NotModifiedException
      Deauthorize the specified seed for the current app
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token of the seed to deauthorize
      Throws:
      Wallet.NotModifiedException - if the seed was not authorized for this app

    • getUnauthorizedSeeds

      @Nullable public static Cursor getUnauthorizedSeeds(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing whether or not there are seeds remaining to be authorized for each purpose for the current app. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.UNAUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor

    • getUnauthorizedSeeds

      @Nullable public static Cursor getUnauthorizedSeeds(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection, @Nullable String filterOnColumn, @Nullable Object value)
      Request a Cursor containing whether or not there are seeds remaining to be authorized for each purpose for the current app which match the provided query. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.UNAUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      filterOnColumn - the column from WalletContractV1.UNAUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS on which to filter
      value - the value of filterOnColumn which all returned rows must match
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if filterOnColumn is not a column in WalletContractV1.UNAUTHORIZED_SEEDS_ALL_COLUMNS, or if value cannot be interpreted as an appropriate type to match against filterOnColumn values.

    • hasUnauthorizedSeedsForPurpose

      public static boolean hasUnauthorizedSeedsForPurpose(@NonNull Context context, int purpose)
      Test whether there are any unauthorized seeds with the specified purpose available for the current app
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      purpose - the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* purpose
      Returns:
      true if there are unauthorized seeds for purpose, else false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if purpose is not a known WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* value

    • getAccounts

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAccounts(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing account metadata for known accounts for the specified auth token. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to retrieve account metadata
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app

    • getAccounts

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAccounts(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, @NonNull String[] projection, @Nullable String filterOnColumn, @Nullable Object value)
      Request a Cursor containing account metadata for known accounts for the specified auth token which match the provided query. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to retrieve account metadata
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      filterOnColumn - the column from WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ALL_COLUMNS on which to filter
      value - the value of filterOnColumn which all returned rows must match
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app, if filterOnColumn is not a column in WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ALL_COLUMNS, or if value cannot be interpreted as an appropriate type to match against filterOnColumn values.

    • getAccount

      @Nullable public static Cursor getAccount(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, long id, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing account metadata for the specified known account for the given auth token. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to retrieve account metadata
      id - the account ID for which to retrieve account metadata
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app

    • updateAccountName

      public static void updateAccountName(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, long id, @Nullable String name) throws Wallet.NotModifiedException
      Update the account name for the specified known account for the given auth token
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to update account metadata
      id - the account ID to update
      name - the new name for the account. If null or blank, the account name will be cleared.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app
      Wallet.NotModifiedException - if ID does not represent a known account

    • updateAccountIsUserWallet

      public static void updateAccountIsUserWallet(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, long id, boolean isUserWallet) throws Wallet.NotModifiedException
      Update the user wallet flag for the specified known account for the given auth token. This flag is intended to be set to true by any wallet that discovers this account is used (or was previously used) by the user to receive tokens or send transactions. Wallet apps can use this flag as a hint for whether or not a wallet should be displayed to a user.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to update account metadata
      id - the account ID to update
      isUserWallet - the new value for the user wallet flag
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app
      Wallet.NotModifiedException - if ID does not represent a known account

    • updateAccountIsValid

      public static void updateAccountIsValid(@NonNull Context context, long authToken, long id, boolean isValid) throws Wallet.NotModifiedException
      Update the valid flag for the specified known account for the given auth token. This flag is intended to be set to true by any wallet that wants to force this account to be displayed to a user, regardless of the value of WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_ACCOUNT_IS_USER_WALLET. Wallet apps can use this flag as a hint for whether or not a wallet should be displayed to a user.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      authToken - the auth token for which to update account metadata
      id - the account ID to update
      isValid - the new value for the valid flag
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if auth token is not valid for this app
      Wallet.NotModifiedException - if ID does not represent a known account

    • getImplementationLimits

      @Nullable public static Cursor getImplementationLimits(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection)
      Request a Cursor containing the implementation limits for the Seed Vault implementation. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.IMPLEMENTATION_LIMITS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      Returns:
      a Cursor

    • getImplementationLimits

      @Nullable public static Cursor getImplementationLimits(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String[] projection, @Nullable String filterOnColumn, @Nullable Object value)
      Request a Cursor containing the implementation limits for the Seed Vault implementation. The projection should be a subset of the columns in WalletContractV1.IMPLEMENTATION_LIMITS_ALL_COLUMNS.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      projection - the set of columns to be present in the returned Cursor
      filterOnColumn - the column from WalletContractV1.IMPLEMENTATION_LIMITS_ALL_COLUMNS on which to filter
      value - the value of filterOnColumn which all returned rows must match
      Returns:
      a Cursor
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if filterOnColumn is not a column in WalletContractV1.IMPLEMENTATION_LIMITS_ALL_COLUMNS, or if value cannot be interpreted as an appropriate type to match against filterOnColumn values.

    • getImplementationLimitsForPurpose

      @NonNull public static ArrayMap<String,Long> getImplementationLimitsForPurpose(@NonNull Context context, int purpose)
      Request the implementation limits of the specified purpose for the Seed Vault implementation.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      purpose - the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* purpose
      Returns:
      a ArrayMap with WalletContractV1.IMPLEMENTATION_LIMITS_MAX_* column names as keys, and the corresponding limits as values

    • resolveDerivationPath

      @NonNull public static Uri resolveDerivationPath(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull Uri derivationPath, int purpose)
      Resolve the provided BIP derivation path Uri with scheme WalletContractV1.BIP32_URI_SCHEME or WalletContractV1.BIP44_URI_SCHEME and the provided WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* purpose to a BIP32 derivation path. This is used to apply purpose-specific properties (such as mandatory hardening) and to translate from BIP44 to BIP32 derivation paths. Entries in the WalletContractV1.ACCOUNTS_TABLE table will always be resolved BIP32 derivation paths.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context in which to perform this request
      derivationPath - a BIP32 or BIP44 Uri to resolve to a BIP32 derivation path for the specified purpose
      purpose - the WalletContractV1.PURPOSE_* purpose for which to resolve derivationPath
      Returns:
      a BIP32 derivation path Uri
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - on failure to resolve the provided derivationPath
